description:
Piccolo quickly takes control of the battle with Frieza, and the putrid purple monster is shocked to learn the secret behind his opponent’s powers!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Piccolo no Jishin! Freezer o Taosu no wa Ore Da
Piccolo se encarrega de vencer Freeza
พิคโกโร่มั่นใจสุดๆ ผู้ที่ล้มฟรีสเซอร์ได้คือข้า
ピッコロの自信! フリーザを倒すのはオレだ
